# Splint Mail
## Overview
Splint mail is made up of metal strips, like [[Banded Mail|banded mail]]. The suit includes gauntlets.


-tx-

|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| |  | **Shield** | **Dex** | **Check** | **Arcane Spell** | **Speed** ||  |
| **Armor** | **Cost** | **Bonus** | **Bonus** | **Penalty** | **Failure Chance** | **30 ft.** | **20 ft.** | **Weight** |
| *Heavy armor* |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Splint mail | 200 gp | +7 | +0 | -7 | 40% | 20 ft.<sup> 2</sup> | 15 ft.<sup> 2</sup> | xx lbs. |
| |||||||||
| <sup>2</sup> When running in heavy armor, you move only triple your speed, not quadruple. |||||||||

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 153
